customer_sentiment.description: The customer was frustrated throughout the call, expressing annoyance at the repeated calls and the process of verifying their identity and making a payment.

agent_performance: The agent performed well, remaining patient and professional despite the customer's frustration, and successfully guided the customer through the payment process.

timestamped_events.description: The agent introduced themselves and the purpose of the call.
The customer expressed frustration at receiving repeated calls.
The customer expressed frustration at the verification process.
The agent disclosed the debt amount and the reason for the call.
The agent offered the customer the option to pay the debt in full or set up a payment plan.
The agent attempted to set up a payment with the customer.
The customer agreed to make a payment.
The agent processed the customer's payment.
The agent confirmed that the payment had been processed successfully.
